name: The Ottomans
startIntroPart1: O Great Sultan Suleiman, may the God bless you! You are revered for your power, wealth and generosity, and you truly deserves to be called the 'Magnificent'! The Ottoman Empire was born in Bithynia, starting as a small country in Eastern Anatolia in 12th century, then expanded to west into Anatolia. Over the next century, your people vanquished the empire of Byzantium, annexing Turkey and the Balkans, and smartly assimilating all wonders and knowledge of the Byzantine civilization. In the mid 15th century, the Ottomans added Constantinople to their empire, establishing a strategic link between Europe and the Middle East. The Empire would continue to expand for centuries reaching North Africa, Middle East and Eastern Europe at its height, but brutally disappeared in the chaos of the first world war, in early 20th century.
startIntroPart2: Mighty Caliph, your people ask you to build again the Empire, to the level of power and glory it once achieved, and beyond! Will you revive the Ottoman golden age? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Your continued insolence and failure to recognize our preeminence leads us to war.
attacked: Good. The world shall witness the incontestable might of my armies and the glory of the Empire.
defeated: Ruin! Ruin! Istanbul becomes Iram of the Pillars, remembered only by the melancholy poets.
introduction: From the magnificence of Topkapi, the Ottoman nation greets you, stranger! I'm Suleiman, Kayser-I Rum, and I bestow upon you my welcome!
tradeRequest: Let us do business! Would you be interested?
uniques: [-66]% maintenance costs <for [Water] units>
[+20]% Golden Age length
During a Golden Age Produce [+15]% [Science] and [+15]% [Culture] [in all cities]
[All] [Military] Units Receive [+4]% More [Strength] When Fighting <During a Golden age>

name: Egypt
startIntroPart1: Blessed queen of the Nile, the glory of Isis shines upon you, oh great Cleopatra Philopator, ruler of the Ptolemaic Kingdom of Egypt. Appointed as joint ruler with your younger brother, you were faced with many difficult situations early in your reign, with the nation in turmoil, famine in abundance and floods in deficit. Eager to rule alone, you acted on these problems yourself, leading your brother to depose you despite your efforts. As Rome’s shadow fell across the Mediterranean, you led the once mighty kingdom of the Ptolemaic dynasty during a time of turmoil. An excellent diplomat, you secured the favour of the Romans and thus, ensured the survival of Egypt as an independent nation and your return to life as the soul monarch. Challenges to your throne were seen off time and time again by your legendary wisdom, striking deals to ensure your survival while the world around descended into civil war. Though you too succumbed to the ravages of this conflict, you will be remembered as Egypt’s last great ruler, one truly beloved by the people.
startIntroPart2: Cleopatra, it is time for you to return to your land once more! Great Amun-Ra has shone upon you; he calls upon you to reunite your people, to begin a new epoch for Egypt. Will you see the lifeblood of your people, the Nile, bring unprecedented harvests yet again? Will you fend off all challengers for your throne? Will you build a civilisation that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I have had enough with you. May Amun Ra guide us!
attacked: Hah! Osiris will be pleased to welcome my enemies.
defeated: Egypt is lost. If I can't embrace my love, I will embrace the asps.
introduction: I am Isis reborn, I am the living Nile, I am Cleopatra and an ally, if you are worthy.
tradeRequest: Generous Egypt makes you this offer for you.
uniques: [+30]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[+3 Culture, +2 Food] from [Flood plains] tiles [in all cities]
Double quantity of [Wheat] produced

name: England
startIntroPart1: Long live to Your Highness, Queen Elizabeth Gloriana, leader and protector of the glorious England! Through history, enduring many invasions, England strengthened its will, playing smartly with diplomacy, cunning, and military power, to eventually rose as one of the most dominant Empires the world has ever known. Their matchless navy, brilliant scientists and artists, and powerful merchants, have shaped the known world for centuries.
startIntroPart2: Queen Elizabeth, will England cast once more its brightness upon all lands and seas of the world? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: By the grace of God, your days are numbered.
defeated: You have triumphed over us. The day is yours.
introduction: We are pleased to meet you.
neutralHello: From The Throne of England, I Greet You.
hateHello: Oh, a Bastard, What Do You Want?!
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in a trade agreement with England?
uniques: [+4] Movement <for [Water] units>
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Renaissance era]>
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Industrial era]>
[+2 Culture, +2 Gold] from each Trade Route
[+40]% Gold from Great Merchant trade mission
All newly-trained [Ranged Water] units [in all cities] receive the [Bombardment II] promotion

name: Russia
startIntroPart1: Hail to Imperial Majesty Catherine, Empress of all Russians. Living in the largest country in the world, from the Pacific Ocean in the east to the Baltic Sea in the west, your people endured wars, droughts, and many disasters, imbuing the Russian society with heroism and tenacity, and producing artists and scientists among the best in the world. Russia is a powerful empire which rightfully claims its place in the world concert of superpowers.
startIntroPart2: Empress Catherine, your people are eager for Russian glory, to revive the sacred light of the Motherland. Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You've behaved yourself very badly, you know it. Now it's payback time.
attacked: You've mistaken my passion for a weakness, you'll regret about this.
defeated: We were defeated, so this makes me your prisoner. I suppose there are worse fates.
introduction: I greet you, stranger! If you are as intelligent and tactful as you are attractive, we'll get along just fine.
tradeRequest: How would you like it if I propose this kind of exchange?
uniques: [+1 Production] from every [Strategic resource]

Double quantity of [Iron] produced
Double quantity of [Uranium] produced

name: Canada
declaringWar: As an unstinting malignancy defines your relationship to Canada, we have no recourse than war.
attacked: As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you, Canada must turn, with reluctance, to war.
defeated: So ends our dream of a Canada that might have been. Our people are good-hearted. Rule with mercy,
introduction: On behalf of the people of Canada, welcome. I am Prime Minister Laurier.
hateHello: Negotiating with you tests the limits of an human patience, Anyway What Can I Help You With?
tradeRequest: The people of Canada present gifts!
uniques: [+3 Food, +2 Production] from every [Tundra]
May Build [Farm] Improvement In [Tundra] tiles
Allied City-States provide [Food] equal to [+60]% of what they produce for themselves
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Industrial era]>

name: France
startIntroPart1: ... You've been hiding your royal highness, or should I say your majesty, as you stand behind the curtains letting your children sought the throne of france, the People of France know who has the real unchallenged Power, It falls to you, Catherine de Medici, to use your gifts of knowledge and of the arts to unite your people. Steer carefully through these troubled times, Queen Mother of France. You will build great wonders, drawing visitors from all corners of the earth. With your keen awareness of all things, both those seen and those hidden in the shadows, your empire will certainly stand the test of time.
startIntroPart2: Catherine de medici, the queen mother of france, it is for you to decide whether or not you shall hold on onto power, but can the unchallenged serpent queen do so, or shall you fall and rot away with time?
declaringWar: Masquerading as friends was kind of fun, wasn't it? Unfortunately it's time to drop the pretense and get to the business at hand..
attacked: You dare attack my sovereign realm? I don't believe even Nostradamus could have predicted this!
defeated: I have lived long enough to know when I am defeated. Carry on.
introduction: I am Catherine, the Queen Mother of France, and I welcome you to the realm. I do so look forward to learning all there is to know about you.
hateHello: oh, You really should start paying attention to what's going on around you.
tradeRequest: I have sent you a trade delegation with all of the customary gifts: herbs, olives, various cheeses, and baguettes to eat them with, of course.
